title: Balanced Body SmartBell, Ergonomically Designed Two-Handed Grip Exercise Weights, 1.5 Pounds
features: ADDS CHALLENGE TO YOUR EXERCISES: Exert more energy so you can burn more calories with the SmartBell Gray, a powerhouse Pilates exercise equipment that tones and strengthens all muscle groups. It targets core muscles in the abdomen, back, shoulders, and chest so you can achieve your fitness goals.

COMFORTABLE GRIPS: Suitable for both home use and group classes, each of these weighted stretch-and-release Pilates accessories feature a 2-handed grip for excellent control. At 1.5 lbs., it is light enough to be held with one hand. It feels nice to the touch and conforms to the body naturally.

STYLISH & ERGONOMIC: Our strength-training weight has a gray color that will blend harmoniously with your Pilates equipment, accessories, and studio. A great addition to your fitness routine, it has a unique shape and sculptural design that’s perfect for smooth, rotational movements.

MANY WAYS TO USE: Designed for extended flowing movements, the SmartBell Gray is suitable for your mat exercises, standing workouts, and equipment routines. Use it to train your legs, feet, arms, and hands by swinging or lifting it. It’s a clever prop for flexibility, balance, and flow.

BALANCED BODY: Balanced Body is dedicated to providing Pilates-based education and equipment that empowers users to be mindful of movement, make healthy lifestyle changes, and ultimately find balance.
description: Uniquely shaped to carve through space in flowing, rotational movements, we love the sculptural and ergonomic design of SmartBells. The two-handed grip allows a high level of control while conforming to your body, and when physical challenges call for holding it with both hands. The extended flowing movements stretch and tone your whole body or targeted muscle groups. Designed to be both aesthetically pleasing to the eye, and comfortable to the touch, you also get a clear stand, so you can display the SmartBell and keep it conveniently stored. This product is green and weighs 1.5 lbs.
